Why do I need Blokada Tunnel?
If your account is new, visit our website. You cannot purchase subscription in Blokada Slim.
Tap your avatar above to see your account ID. Remember, your ID is secret and you should keep it to yourself. Write it down in case you uninstall the app.
Here you can restore your existing account if, for example, you re-installed the app.
With Blokada Tunnel your data is encrypted, your IP address is hidden, and your location is changed.
In order to use the VPN, you need an active account. Check or restore your account here.
Select one of the gateways to connect to. Your device will send your encrypted data securely through that gateway, and you will stay anonymous.
If you experience any problems, do not hesitate to contact us.

DNS is responsible for translating IP addresses of websites and apps you use. Choosing a good DNS may speed up your device and will help protect your privacy.
Select one of the DNS servers.

Some apps may not work properly with Blokada. For example, they may have trouble connecting.

Activating VPN often helps in those cases.

Otherwise, you can make those apps bypass Blokada inspection altogether. Remember, bypassed apps communicate outside of Blokada Tunnel.
System apps are the ones coming preinstalled with your device. Some of them are hidden. Modify those only if you know what you are doing.
Host lists contain rules for blocking ads and trackers. Try to keep the number of active lists low.
Hosts you add here will never be blocked. Use this list when, for example, a website you visit is mistakenly blocked.
Hosts you add here will always be blocked. For example, you may add websites that are not blocked by the standard lists, but should be.
